channel.title: Pleeeease=p
channel.description:
Hai. You all have heard of the masks, mask100var1, mask100var2 correct? It's to do with facing Gfx on player.
Now this will really help me.
I know for a fact there is, but, does anyone know the masks that control facing gfx on npcs?
Many thanks.
-
Whats this for?
Npc arrow draw backs, dds spec.
-
Once i've got this, i will release what i've done so far.. Last thing for private servers plox. [img]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/5646/xjkxlolcr5.png[/img]
Perf dds spec on player.
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/2578/xjkxlol2kp6.png[/img]
Perf dds spec on npc.
[img]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/4786/xjkxlol3qc5.png[/img]
Perf d mace spec on player/npc.
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/4791/xjkxlol4dg3.png[/img]
Fully working dark bow, double hits every time. player/npc.
[img]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/6339/xjkxlol5ti6.png[/img]
Arrow draw backs. player/npc.
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/5584/xjkxlol6cg0.png[/img]
Dark bow spec. player/npc.
[img]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/4562/xjkxlol7me3.png[/img] [img]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/4945/xjkxlol8en6.png[/img]
Perfect high/low alch.
-
Now i know some people may think wtf thats noob. But tbh i'm pretty proud of it cause i did it myself.. Yea i have made quite alot of posts on mopar, but none of them actually gave me the answer..
Anyway, back on topic, can someone answer my question?

item.title: Pleeeease=p
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Hai. You all have heard of the masks, mask100var1, mask100var2 correct? It’s to do with facing Gfx on player.

Now this will really help me.

I know for a fact there is, but, does anyone know the masks that control facing gfx on npcs?

Many thanks.

Whats this for?

Npc arrow draw backs, dds spec.

Once i’ve got this, i will release what i’ve done so far… Last thing for private servers plox.

Perf dds spec on player.

Perf dds spec on npc.

Perf d mace spec on player/npc.

Fully working dark bow, double hits every time. player/npc.

Arrow draw backs. player/npc.

Dark bow spec. player/npc.


Perfect high/low alch.

Now i know some people may think wtf thats noob. But tbh i’m pretty proud of it cause i did it myself… Yea i have made quite alot of posts on mopar, but none of them actually gave me the answer…

Anyway, back on topic, can someone answer my question?

Read full topic
